block.p: Dr. Nerissa Sylvia Guballa, a daughter of Dr. Sylvia Pagulayan and Francisco M. Guballa Jr. of Tenafly, N.J., was married yesterday to Dr. Timothy Chandra Dutta, the son of Dorothy Dutta and Dr. Paritosh C. Dutta of Dallas. Rabbi Jerry Heller officiated, with the participation of the Rev. Gerald Heinen, a Roman Catholic priest, at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y. Afterward, Gopal Bhattacharya, a Hindu priest, performed a Hindu ceremony.

Dr. Guballa and Dr. Dutta, both 27, are residents at the New York Weill Cornell Center of New York Presbyterian Hospital, she in obstetrics and gynecology and he in internal medicine. They were classmates at Cornell University, where they received bachelor's degrees, and at Cornell Medical College in New York, where they received medical degrees, and where they met.

Dr. Nerissa Sylvia Guballa, a daughter of Dr. Sylvia Pagulayan and Francisco M. Guballa Jr. of Tenafly, N.J., was married yesterday to Dr. Timothy Chandra Dutta, the son of Dorothy Dutta and Dr. Paritosh C. Dutta of Dallas. Rabbi Jerry Heller officiated, with the participation of the Rev. Gerald Heinen, a Roman Catholic priest, at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y. Afterward, Gopal Bhattacharya, a Hindu priest, performed a Hindu ceremony.

Dr. Guballa and Dr. Dutta, both 27, are residents at the New York Weill Cornell Center of New York Presbyterian Hospital, she in obstetrics and gynecology and he in internal medicine. They were classmates at Cornell University, where they received bachelor's degrees, and at Cornell Medical College in New York, where they received medical degrees, and where they met.

The bride's mother, an internist, practices in Jersey City. The bride's father is the president of the Guballa Marketing Corporation, a fishery in Manila. The bridegroom's father, a specialist in asthma and allergies, practices in Dallas.
